description:
When a medical malpractice event devastates your health, finances and future, you want a law firm with a reputation for excellence in all aspects of representation. Kaveny + Kroll in Chicago, Illinois, was founded by two of the country's most recognizable trial attorneys and lays claim to the largest personal injury verdict obtained ever in the state. We let our commitment to justice drive us and guide our fight to protect your rights and claim to full financial recovery. We have extensive experience in medical malpractice and welcome the cases that other offices may shy away from. We relish the opportunity to hold negligent doctors, hospitals, nurses and other health care professionals accountable and to assist you in getting your life back on track.

The attorneys at our law firm dedicate their careers to helping the injured and sick. With thousands of cases under our belts and countless successes at trial on our record, we feel confident in our ability to help you in cases stemming from the following:

· Personal injury
· Car and truck accidents
· Recreational vehicle accidents
· Aviation and mass transit injuries
· Birth and brain injuries
· Premises liability
· Workplace injury
· Police misconduct
· Fires and explosions
· Animal bites
· Construction accidents
· Nursing home abuse
· Sexual abuse
· Workers' compensation
· Wrongful death

Together, our team of partners and junior trial attorneys has garnered countless multimillion-dollar verdicts, with some verdicts soaring into the nine digits. We attribute our success to our personalized approach, which begins during the free initial consultation. Kaveny + Kroll is a law firm known for building more valuable relationships and taking a creative approach to each case, which is why we recently added virtual appointments to our offerings.
